faq.A2: Find answers to common questions about our platform

B1.question: Which education systems do you support?
B1.answer: We support both the Anglophone and Francophone education systems in Cameroon, covering all major examinations including GCE O/A Levels, BEPC, Probatoire, and BAC.

B2.question: How do I access the video corrections?
B2.answer: Once you've created an account and subscribed to a plan, you can access all video corrections through our platform. Videos are organized by subject, exam type, and year.

B3.question: Are the textbook solutions available offline?
B3.answer: Currently, our content is available online only. However, you can access it from any device with an internet connection.

B4.question: Can I switch between plans?
B4.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

B5.question: Do you offer group discounts for schools?
B5.answer: Yes, we offer special pricing for schools and educational institutions. Please contact our sales team for more information.

B6.question: How often is new content added?
B6.answer: We regularly update our content library with new exam corrections and textbook solutions. We also add new features and improvements based on user feedback.
